game.name: Diggerman
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dig, dig, dig! For love, for fame, for money! Fast arcade digging game with story, treasures and boss fight! Let’s dig together, let’s find some treasures, let’s put them on the ground and make some money!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dig, dig, dig! For love, for fame, for money! Fast arcade digging game with story, treasures and boss fight! Let’s dig together, let’s find some treasures, let’s put them on the ground and make some money!

reviewHighlights.text: 집중력이 떨어질때쯤 죽어버리는 게임 그럭저럭 할만함.
